com.github.curriculeon.greeps

Class Spaceship

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • com.github.curriculeon.greeps.Spaceship

  • public class Spaceship
extends greenfoot.Actor
    A space ship. It comes from space, lands, and releases some Greeps into the world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spaceship(int position)
      Create a space ship.

      Move the ship down (for movement before landing).

      Record that we have collected another tomato.
